testcase.classname: The Ability to edit Personal Details in My Info
testcase.name: Verify only some fields are editable
testcase.system-out: Given The User is Logged in using valid ESS credentials.....................passed When The User Clicks My Info Button.........................................passed And The User Clicks on Personal Details Button..............................passed Then Only First Name, Middle Name, Last Name,Other Id, Licence Expiry date,Nationality, Marital Status, Gender are Editable.passed Then Employee Id, Driver Licence Number are not editable....................passed
